tool_description: Fast and Reliable Image Web Searches on Google Image Search in Real-Time.
name: Real-Time Image Search
title: Real-Time Image Search

api_list.name: Search Images
api_list.description: Get real-time image search results from across the web. Supports all Google Images search filters.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
The country / region from which to make the query.

**Allowed values:** 2-letter country code, see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)
**Default:** us.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Find images of a specific type.

**Allowed values:** *face, photo, clipart, lineart, animated*

optional_parameters.name: usage_rights
optional_parameters.description:
Find images with specific usage rights / license / copyright.

**Allowed values:** *creative_commons, commercial*

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description:
Find images last updated in a specific time range.

**Allowed values:** *day, week, month, year*

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description:
Find images of a specific size.

**Allowed values:** *large, medium, icon, 400x300+, 640x480+, 800x600+, 1024x768+, 2mp+, 4mp+, 6mp+, 8mp+, 10mp+, 12mp+, 15mp+, 20mp+, 40mp+, 70mp+*

optional_parameters.name: file_type
optional_parameters.description:
Find images of a specific format / file type.

**Allowed values:** *jpg, jpeg, png, gif, svg, webp, ico, raw*

optional_parameters.name: safe_search
optional_parameters.description:
How to show explicit content in your search results, like sexual activity and graphic violence. 

**Allowed values:** *off, blur*
**Default:** *blur*

optional_parameters.name: aspect_ratio
optional_parameters.description:
Find images with a specific aspect ratio.

**Allowed values:** *tall, square, wide, panoramic*

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Find images published in a specific country / region.

**Allowed values:** 2-letter country code, see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description:
Find images with a specific dominant color.

**Allowed values:** *red, orange, yellow, green, teal, blue, purple, pink, white, gray, black, brown, full, transparent, grayscale*
